name: RxSSEClient
summary: Simple SSE client written on RxSwift.
description:
Simple SSE client written on RxSwift.
The main idea is to use one to one relationship between event and network connection,
even if there are multiple subcribers for the same event.
In this case the class instance will create one URLSession binded to one PublishSubject,
which retransmits messages to all observers.
